node.title: Easily test your Vuex store using Vue Test Utils.
node.description: Tired of brittle tests by testing your Vuex actions, mutations and getters all separately? Vue Test Utils has the solution!

node.title: A common enemy to software developers.
node.description: Fear of missing out & imposter syndrome are two serious problems that many software developers have to deal with. Trust me, you're not alone... & trust me, you're also fantastic at what you do, regardless what you might think.

node.title: Tips for learning a new code base.
node.description: Need to quickly learn a new code base or upskill in some technologies? Here are my tips.

node.title: Creating & deploying a .NET Core Web API to AWS with the Serverless Framework.
node.description: Lambda functions are nice... but sometimes you just want a whole API!

node.title: Running Entity Framework Core migrations from a separate solution that doesn't contain a Startup.cs file.
node.description: After an hour of tearing my hair out...
